body: @sirfilm, you have my utmost gratitude for your recap of the story

[PART2] Sea ends up calling Hiro on the phone while Shou is heading to the store for condoms and the call ends with him unable to tell her over the phone that he knows she's about to have sex with Shou and that he doesn't want it to happen because he likes her, but he clams up leading to the event to happen. Honestly it's a bit weird Sea does that since she's clearly uncomfortable she got caught in that situation, but after some hesitation, she does. During this after sex fellatio, Shou prompts Hiro to join in which causes Sea to react a bit. It ends with his internal struggle and reaching out his hand, presumably to the condom where we can assume they all kinda go the sex friend route with him feeling guilty he isn't able to pursue her properly.

Don't be led astray by SatchPangit's generic NTR story. That's not really what is happening here. 

[PART1] None of them are in a relationship. They're all just childhood friends. Sea (girl) got interested in sex because Hiro (black haired boy) introduced her to some H stuff he found on the internet once when they were young, so she built up a excessive interest in pervy stuff, going the route pervy artist route, using the two of them as material. Shou and Sea get more and more into it over the next days and it forces our main guy to question if he's comfortable with what happened the first night. He ends up discovering the two of them have continued their rondevous and Shou is going in for the full penetration kill.
